description: CA contains the x509 CA public cert and optionally a private key

crt.description: Crt is the public part of the X509 CA certificate

key.description: Crt is the private part of the X509 CA certificate The private key is required for signing

secretRef.description: SecretRef is an optional reference to a secret in the runtime cluster that contains the CA certificate and key Expects the following optional keys - ca.crt:  Crt - ca.key:  Key

validity.description: Validity specifies the lifetime of a generated CA certificates (ignored for existing certificates)
